title: Are you buying Apple 12 just for 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: No,I was planning to yo buy iphone 12 but not only because of 5G.Because it will atleast take 2 years for 5G to be start rolling in india. So i bought iphone 11 at its value for money option as of now Also iphone support limited 5G bandwidth so not sure how much you will get benefit from current 5G hardware in iphone once 5G is available in India. Its better to wait for 5G to rollout first and then buy latest iphone at that time, iphone 14 maybe.

I have ONE PLUS NORD 5G. Which i bought few months back. I Bought it because it's a good device ( value for money ). But 5G was not in my mind. I actually don't care about it. Because, 5G will took 2–3 years minimum in India. And in that period I usually change my phone or use that phone as secondary device. So, 5G is not important at the moment for me.
